encodingDesc.p: The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text divison separates words with spaces ("ity evam" not "ityevam"), where sandhi permits.

lg.l: 1.11 āsannaṃ brahmaṇas tasya tapasām uttamaṃ tapaḥ
prathamaṃ chandasām aṅgam āhur vyākaraṇaṃ budhāḥ
yat tat puṇyatamaṃ jyotis tasya mārgo+ayam āñjasaḥ
tathaiva loke vidyānām eṣā vidyā parāyaṇam
chandasyaś chandasāṃ yonim ātmā chandomayīṃ tanum
yad asminn eva tamasi jyotiḥ śuddhaṃ vivartate
anvākhyeyāś ca ye śabdā ye cāpi pratipādakāḥ
dharme ye pratyaye cāṅgaṃ saṃbandhāḥ sādhvasādhuṣu
1.26 te liṅgaiś ca svaśabdaiś ca śāstre+asminn upavarṇitāḥ
smṛtyartham anugamyante ke cid eva yathāgamam
1.28 nityatve kṛtakatve vā teṣām ādir na vidyate
1.29 nānarthikām imāṃ kaś cid vyavasthāṃ kartum arhati
1.30 na cāgamād ṛte dharmas tarkeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate
ṛṣīṇām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy āgamapūrvakam
na tāṃl lokaprasiddhatvāt kaś cit tarkeṇa bādhate
1.33 nirjñātaśakter dravyasya tāṃ tām arthakriyāṃ prati
ye bhāvān vacanaṃ teṣāṃ nānumānena bādhyate
1.39 yo yasya svam iva jñānaṃ darśanaṃ nātiśaṅkate
thitaṃ pratyakṣapakṣe taṃ katham anyo nivartayet
1.40 idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ pāpam ity etasmin padadvaye
1.41 caitanyam iva yaś cāyam avicchedena vartate
āgamas tam upāsīno hetuvādair na bādhyate
1.43 tasmād akṛtakaṃ śāstraṃ smṛtiṃ ca sanibandhanām
1.46 ātmabhedaṃ tayoḥ ke cid astīty āhuḥ purāṇagāḥ
tadvac chabdo+api buddhisthaḥ śrutīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ pṛthak
1.48 vitarkitaḥ purā buddhyā kva cid arthe niveśitaḥ
1.49 nādasya kramajātatvān na pūrvo na paraś ca saḥ
1.51 ātmarūpaṃ yathā jñāne jñeyarūpaṃ ca dṛśyate
artharūpaṃ tathā śabde svarūpaṃ ca prakāśate
vṛttis tasya kriyārūpā bhāgaśo bhajate kramam
1.54 yathā prayoktuḥ prāg buddhiḥ śabdeṣv eva pravartate
vyavasāyo grahītṝṇām evaṃ teṣv eva jāyate
1.56 grāhyatvaṃ grāhakatvaṃ ca dve śaktī tejaso yathā
1.62 yo ya uccāryate śabdo niyataṃ na sa kāryabhāk
1.63 uccaran paratantratvād guṇaḥ kāryair na yujyate
tasyāpy uccāraṇe rūpam anyat tasmād vivicyate
ṣaṣṭhyāś ca prathamāyāś ca nimittatvāya kalpate
asyeti vyatirekaś ca tadarthād eva jāyate
1.69 svaṃ rūpam iti kaiś cit tu vyaktiḥ saṃjñopadiśyate
jāteḥ kāryāṇi saṃsṛṣṭā jātis tu pratipadyate
1.70 saṃjñinīṃ vyaktim icchanti sūtre grāhyām athāpare
1.71 kāryatve nityatāyāṃ vā ke cid ekatvavādinaḥ
kāryatve nityatāyāṃ vā ke cin nānātvavādinaḥ
vākyeṣu padam ekaṃ ca bhinneṣv apy upalabhyate
1.73 na varṇavyatirekeṇa padam anyac ca vidyate
vākyaṃ varṇapadābhyāṃ ca vyatiriktaṃ na kiṃ ca na
1.74 pade na varṇā vidyante varṇeṣv avayavā na ca
vākyāt padānām atyantaṃ pravibhāgo na kaś ca na
tatra yan mukhyam ekeṣāṃ tatrānyeṣāṃ viparyayaḥ
1.78 śabdasya grahaṇe hetuḥ prākṛto dhvanir iṣyate
dhvanayaḥ samupohante sphoṭātmā tair na bhidyate
1.82 cakṣuṣaḥ prāpyakāritve tejasā tu dvayor api
viṣayendriyayor iṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa kramo dhvaneḥ
kaiś cid dhvanir asaṃvedyaḥ svatantro+anyaiḥ prakalpitaḥ
āvṛttyā na tu sa granthaḥ pratyāvṛtti nirūpyate
1.87 asataś cāntarāle yāñ śabdān astīti manyate
pratipattur aśaktiḥ sā grahaṇopāya eva saḥ
1.92 yathaiva darśanaiḥ pūrvair dūrāt saṃtamase+api vā
1.95 bhāgavatsv api teṣv eva rūpabhedo dhvaneḥ kramāt
kaiś cid vyaktaya evāsyā dhvanitvena prakalpitāḥ
āśrayair api nityānāṃ jātīnāṃ vyaktir iṣyate
1.99 deśādibhiś ca saṃbandho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyavatām api
sa sphoṭaḥ śabdajāḥ śabdā dhvanayo+anyair udāhṛtāḥ
1.106 alpe mahati vā śabde sphoṭakālo na bhidyate
1.107 dūrāt prabheva dīpasya dhvanimātraṃ tu lakṣyate
ghaṇṭādīnāṃ ca śabdeṣu vyakto bhedaḥ sa dṛśyate
kampe tūparate jātā nādā vṛtter viśeṣakāḥ
kaiś cid darśanabhedo hi pravādeṣv anavasthitaḥ
1.116 sa manobhāvam āpadya tejasā pākam āgataḥ
1.119 ātmā buddhyā samarthyārthān mano yuṅkte vivakṣayā
manaḥ kāyāgnim āhanti sa prerayati mārutam]
vyajanād vāyur iva sa svanimittāt pratīyate
1.121 tasya prāṇe ca yā śaktir yā ca buddhau vyavasthitā
chandobhya eva prathamam etad viśvaṃ pravartate
1.126 sādhvī vāg bhūyasī yeṣu puruṣeṣu vyavasthitā
adhikaṃ vartate teṣu puṇyaṃ rūpaṃ prajāpateḥ
1.127 prājāpatyaṃ mahat tejas tatpātrair iva saṃvṛtam
1.128 yad etan maṇḍalaṃ bhāsvad dhāma citrasya rādhasaḥ
sthānānām abhighātaś ca na vinā śabdabhāvanām
1.131 na so+asti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamād ṛte
anuviddham iva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena bhāsate
na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī
1.134 saiṣā saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃjñā bahir antaś ca vartate
āmnātā sarvavidyāsu vāg eva prakṛtiḥ parā
te mṛtyum ativartante ye vai vācam upāsate
1.139 pravibhāge yathā kartā tayā kārye pravartate
1.141 svamātrā paramātrā vā śrutyā prakramyate yathā
tathaiva rūḍhatām eti tayā hy artho vidhīyate
1.143 api prayoktur ātmānaṃ śabdam antar avasthitam
prāhur mahāntam ṛṣabhaṃ yena sāyujyam iṣyate
1.144 tasmād yaḥ śabdasaṃskāraḥ sā siddhiḥ paramātmanaḥ
1.146 vācaḥ saṃskāram ādhāya vācaṃ jñāne niveśya ca
vibhajya bandhanāny asyāḥ kṛtvā tāṃ chinnabandhanām
1.148 na jātv akartṛkaṃ kaś cid āgamaṃ pratipadyate
1.149 astaṃ yāteṣu vādeṣu kartṛṣv anyeṣv asatsv api
1.150 jñāne svābhāvike nārthaḥ śāstraiḥ kaś ca na vidyate
dharmo jñānasya hetuś cet tasyāmnāyo nibandhanam
1.153 śabdānām eva sā śaktis tarko yaḥ puruṣāśrayaḥ
pītaṃ na gamayet svargaṃ kiṃ tat kratugataṃ nayet
1.156 yathaiṣāṃ tatra sāmarthyaṃ dharme+apy evaṃ pratīyatām
viparītaṃ ca sarvatra śakyate vaktum āgame
1.159 vaikharyā madhyamāyāś ca paśyantyāś caitad adbhutam
1.160 gaur iva prakṣaraty ekā rasam uttamaśālinī
1.162 anyā tv apreryamāṇaiva vinā prāṇena vartate
jāyate hi tataḥ prāṇo vācam āpyāyayan punaḥ
sarvasyocchvāsam āsādya na vāg vadati karhi cit
tayor api ca ghoṣiṇyā nirghoṣaiva garīyasī
puruṣe ṣoḍaśakale tām āhur amṛtāṃ kalām
śiṣṭair nibadhyamānā tu na vyavacchidyate smṛtiḥ
bhāvatattvaṃ tu vijñāya liṅgebhyo vihitā smṛtiḥ
1.175 śabdaḥ saṃskārahīno yo gaur iti prayuyukṣyate
1.178 na śiṣṭair anugamyante paryāyā iva sādhavaḥ
te yataḥ smṛtiśāstreṇa tasmāt sākṣād avācakāḥ
avyaktaṃ tadvidāṃ tena vyaktau bhavati niścayaḥ
prasiddhim āgatā yena teṣāṃ sādhur avācakaḥ
2.2 padam ādyaṃ pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ sāpekṣam ity api
vākyaṃ prati matir bhinnā bahudhā nyāyadarśinām
2.5 saṃbodhanapadaṃ yac ca tat kriyāyā viśeṣakam
2.14 brāhmaṇārtho yathā nāsti kaś cid brāhmaṇakambale
2.16 aśābdo yadi vākyārthaḥ padārtho+api tathā bhavet
evaṃ sati ca saṃbandhaḥ śabdasyārthena hīyate
2.18 teṣāṃ tu kṛtsno vākyārthaḥ pratibhedaṃ samāpyate
2.19 sa vyaktaḥ kramavāñ śabda upāṃśu yam adhīyate
2.22 nityeṣu ca kutaḥ pūrvaṃ paraṃ vā paramārthataḥ
ekasyaiva tu sā śaktir yad evam avabhāsate
2.23 ciraṃ kṣipram iti jñāne kālabhedād ṛte yathā
2.24 na nityaḥ kramamātrābhiḥ kālo bhedam ihārhati
2.25 tābhyo yā jāyate buddhir ekā sā bhāgavarjitā
2.28 adāni vākye tāny eva varṇās te ca pade yadi
2.29 bhāgānām anupaśleṣān na varṇo na padaṃ bhavet
2.30 d antaḥśabdatattvaṃ tu bhāgair ekaṃ prakāśitam
m āhur apare śabdaṃ tasya vākye tathaikatām
kaś cid eva viśiṣṭo+arthaḥ sarveṣu pratyayas tathā
2.38 upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate
2.39 arthaṃ kathaṃ cit puruṣaḥ kaś cit saṃpratipadyate
saṃsṛṣṭā vā vibhaktā vā bhedā vākyanibandhanāḥ
2.40 so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandho buddhyā prakramyate yadā
vākyārthasya tadaiko+api varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ kva cit
2.42 saṃbandhe sati yat tv anyad ādhikyam upajāyate
2.46 kāryānumeyaḥ saṃbandho rūpaṃ tasya na vidyate
2.49 santa eva viśeṣā ye padārtheṣu vyavasthitāḥ
te kramād anugamyante na vākyam abhidhāyakam
2.50 śabdānāṃ kramamātre ca nānyaḥ śabdo+asti vācakaḥ
kramo hi dharmaḥ kālasya tena vākyaṃ na vidyate
2.51 ye ca saṃbhavino bhedāḥ padārtheṣv avibhāvitāḥ
saṃnidhāne vyajyante na tu varṇeṣv ayaṃ kramaḥ
padākhyā vākyasaṃjñā ca śabdatvaṃ neṣyate tayoḥ
2.53 samāne+api tu śabdatve dṛṣṭaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ padāt
prativarṇaṃ tv asau nāsti padasyārtham ato viduḥ
2.54 yathā sāvayavā varṇā vinā vācyena kena cit
arthavantaḥ samuditā vākyam apy evam iṣyate
padānāṃ saṃhitā yoniḥ saṃhitā vā padāśrayā
2.59 padāmnāyaś ca yady anyaḥ saṃhitāyā nidarśakaḥ
nityas tatra kathaṃ kāryaṃ padaṃ lakṣaṇadarśanāt
2.62 sūkṣmaṃ grāhyaṃ yathānyena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saha gṛhyate
varṇo+apy anyena varṇena saṃbaddho vācakas tathā
2.63 padasyoccāraṇād artho yathā kaś cin nirūpyate
varṇānām api sāṃnidhyāt tathā so+arthaḥ pratīyate
2.64 prāptasya yasya sāmarthyān niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ
vrīhiśrutyā nivarteta na syāt pratinidhis tathā
dravyatvam aviruddhatvāt prāptyarthaḥ san na bādhate
2.68 na ca sāmānyavat sarve kriyāśabdena lakṣitāḥ
viśeṣā na hi sarveṣāṃ satāṃ śabdo+abhidhāyakaḥ
2.70 asaṃnidhau pratinidhir mā bhūn nityasya karmaṇaḥ
kāmyasya vā pravṛttasya lopa ity upapadyate
dravyābhāve pratinidhau tasya tat syāt kriyāntaram
2.72 nirjñātārthaṃ padaṃ yac ca tadarthe pratipādite
pikādi yad avijñātaṃ tat kim ity anuyujyate
2.74 aprāpto yas tu śuklādiḥ saṃnidhānena gamyate
2.75 abhinnam eva vākyaṃ tu yady abhinnārtham iṣyate
tat sarvaṃ śrutibhūtatvān na śrutyaiva virotsyate
2.77 prāsaṅgikam idaṃ kāryam idaṃ tantreṇa labhyate
2.78 ūho+asmin viṣaye nyāyyaḥ saṃbandho+asya na bādhyat
2.79 arthitvam atra sāmarthyam asminn artho na bhidyate
2.80 iyaṃ śrutyā kramaprāptir iyam uccāraṇād iti
kramo+ayam atra balavān asmiṃs tu na vivakṣitaḥ
2.82 idaṃ pradhānaṃ śeṣo+ayaṃ viniyogakramas tv ayam
idaṃ gauṇam idaṃ mukhyaṃ vyāpīdaṃ guru laghv idam
te sarve na prakalperan padaṃ cet syād avācakam
2.91 aprasiddhaṃ tu yaṃ bhāgam adṛṣṭam anupaśyati
2.93 ekasya bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedaś ca lakṣyate
2.98 śāstre pratyāyakasyāpi kva cid ekatvam āśritam
pratyāyyena kva cid bhedo grahaṇagrāhyayoḥ sthitaḥ
2.99 ū ity abhedam āśritya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prakalpitam
lṛluṭor grahaṇe bhedo grāhyābhyāṃ saha kalpitaḥ
2.100 yasyety etad aṇo rūpaṃ saṃjñinām abhidhāyakam
2.101 ū ity etad abhinnaṃ ca bhinnavākyanibandhanam
bhedena grahaṇaṃ yasya pararūpam iva dvayoḥ
vyudasyatā punar bhedaḥ śabdeṣv atyantam āśritaḥ
ātmatyāgād ṛte bhinnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa kramaḥ śrutau
2.107 ṛco vā gītimātraṃ vā sāma dravyāntaraṃ na tu
gītibhedāt tu gṛhyante tā eva vikṛtā ṛcaḥ
tantreṇoccāraṇaṃ kāryam anyathā te na sādhavaḥ
yathā tathaiva tantrāt syād bahūnām ekarūpatā
yasya tasya na saṃbandho vākyānām upapadyate
2.118 anāgamaś ca so+abhyāsaḥ samayaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
anantaram idaṃ kāryam asmād ity upadarśakaḥ
na sa śabdasya viṣayaḥ sa hi yatnāntarāśrayaḥ
2.121 ke cid bhedāḥ prakāśyante śabdais tadabhidhāyibhiḥ
anuniṣpādinaḥ kāṃś cic chabdārthān iti manyate
2.122 jāteḥ pratyāyake śabde yā vyaktir anuṣaṅgiṇī
2.124 kriyā vinā prayogeṇa na dṛṣṭā śabdacoditā
prayogas tv anuniṣpādī śabdārtha iti gamyate
2.125 niyatās tu prayogā ye niyataṃ yac ca sādhanam
asatyo vāpi saṃsargaḥ śabdārthaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
2.127 asatyopādhi yat satyaṃ tad vā śabdanibandhanām
śabdo vāpy abhijalpatvam āgato yāti vācyataṃ
2.128 so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād rūpam ekīkṛtaṃ yadā
kiṃ cid eva kva cid rūpaṃ prādhānyenāvatiṣṭhate
2.131 aśakteḥ sarvaśakter vā śabdair eva prakalpitā
sa bāhyaṃ vastv iti jñātaḥ śabdārtha iti gamyate
2.136 asminn api dṛśye+arthe darśanaṃ bhidyate pṛthak
kālāntareṇa caiko+api taṃ paśyaty anyathā punaḥ
2.139 ṛṣīṇāṃ darśanaṃ yac ca tattve kiṃ cid avasthitam
na tena vyavahāro+asti na tac chabdanibandhanam
2.140 talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva
naiva cāsti talaṃ vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ
2.141 tasmāt pratyakṣam apy arthaṃ vidvān īkṣeta yuktitaḥ
na darśanasya prāmāṇyād dṛśyam arthaṃ prakalpayet
vyavahāre samākhyānaṃ tat prajño na vikalpayet
vākyārtha iti tām āhuḥ ē̃ padārthair upapāditām
2.144 idaṃ tad iti sānyeṣām anākhyeyā kathaṃ ca na
pratyātmavṛtti siddhā sā kartrāpi na nirūpyate
itikartavyatāyāṃ tāṃ na kaś cid ativartate
gośabdo na tv asau teṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ prakāśakaḥ
śabdaḥ pravartamāno+api na tān aṅgīkaroty asau
kaiś cit tv avayavair dṛṣṭair arthaḥ kṛtsno+anumīyate
bindau ca samudāye ca vācakaḥ salilādiṣu
2.161 yāṃs tu saṃbhavino dharmān antarṇīya prayujyate
śabdas teṣāṃ na sāṃnidhyaṃ niyamena vyapekṣate
gośabdo na tathā jāter viprayoge pravartate
2.164 vācikā dyotikā vā syur dvitvādīnāṃ vibhaktayaḥ
arthān svarūpabhedena kāṃś cid āhur gavādayaḥ
niyamas tatra na tv evaṃ niyamo nuṭśabādiṣu
bahūnāṃ saṃbhave+arthānāṃ nimittaṃ kiṃ cid iṣyate
kaiś cit kathaṃ cid ākhyātā nimittāvadhisaṃkaraiḥ
2.174 kaiś cin nirvacanaṃ bhinnaṃ girater garjater gameḥ
gavater gadater vāpi gaur ity atrānudarśitam
2.175 gaur ity eva svarūpād vā gośabdo goṣu vartate
vyutpādyate na vā sarvaṃ kaiś cic cobhayatheṣyate
2.177 arthāntare ca yad vṛttaṃ tat prakṛtyantaraṃ viduḥ
tulyarūpaṃ na tad rūḍhāv anyasminn anuṣajyate
kaiś cit kathaṃ cid uddiṣṭau citraṃ hi pratipādanam
bhedābhedābhyupagame na virodho+asti kaś ca na
dhātūpasargayoḥ śāstre dhātur eva tu tādṛśaḥ
2.181 tathā hi saṃgrāmayateḥ sopasargād vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
sādhanair yāti saṃbandhaṃ tathābhūtaiva sā kriyā
dhātutvaṃ karmabhāvaś ca tathānyad api dṛśyatām
2.187 kva cit saṃbhavino bhedāḥ kevalair anidarśitāḥ
2.188 sa vācako viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavād dyotako+api vā
2.189 sthādibhiḥ kevalair yac ca gamanādi na gamyate
āgamā iva ke cit tu saṃbhūyārthasya sādhakāḥ
2.193 upariṣṭāt purastād vā dyotakatvaṃ na bhidyate
2.194 cādayo na prayujyante padatve sati kevalāḥ
guṇaiḥ padānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ paratantrās tu cādayaḥ
2.197 janayitvā kriyā kā cit saṃbandhaṃ vinivartate
śrūyamāṇe kriyāśabde saṃbandho jāyate kva cit
yujyate vir yathā tasya likhāv anupasargatā
2.201 tiṣṭhater aprayogaś ca dṛṣṭo+apraty ajayann iti
sunv abhīty ābhimukhye ca kevalo+api prayujyate
2.204 kriyāyā dyotako nāyaṃ na saṃbandhasya vācakaḥ
varṇānāṃ padam arthena yuktaṃ nāvayavāḥ pade
2.209 ke cid dhi yutasiddhārthā bhede nirjñātaśaktayaḥ
ātvādīnāṃ hi śuddhānāṃ laukiko+artho na vidyate
prāg vibhaktes tadantasya tathaivārtho na vidyate
2.213 ātmabhedo na cet kaś cid varṇebhyaḥ padavākyayoḥ
2.214 varṇena kena cin nyūnaḥ saṃghāto yo +abhidhāyakaḥ
na cec chabdāntaram asāv anyūnas tena gamyate
2.215 sa tasmin vācake śabde nimittāt smṛtim ādadhat
2.216 padavācyo yathā nārthaḥ kaś cid gaurakharādiṣu
saty api pratyaye+atyantaṃ samudāye na gamyate
2.221 gargā ity eka evāyaṃ bahuṣv artheṣu vartate
2.224 yathā ca khadiracchede bhāgeṣu kramavāṃś chidiḥ
prādhānyaṃ bahudhā bhāṣye doṣās tu prakriyāgatāḥ
2.230 yam artham āhatur bhinnau pratyayāv eka eva ta
kva cid āha pacantīti dhātus tābhyāṃ vinā kva cit
2.235 yathābhyāsaṃ hi vāg arthe pratipattiṃ samīhate
samārambhāc ca bhāvānām ādimad brahma śāśvatam
asatye vartmani sthitvā tataḥ satyaṃ samīhate
punar vākye tam evārtham anyathā pratipadyate
2.240 upāttā bahavo+apy arthā yeṣv ante pratiṣedhanam
kriyate te nivartante tasmāt tāṃs tatra nāśrayet
nārthe na buddhau saṃbandho nivṛtter avatiṣṭhate
aśabdavācyā sā buddhir nivartyeta sthitā katham
2.243 atha yaj jñānam utpannaṃ tan mithyeti nañā kṛtam
athādhāraḥ sa evāsya niyamārthā śrutir bhavet
kaś cid evārthavāṃs tatra śabdaḥ śeṣās tv anarthakāḥ
2.249 pūrvaṃ padeṣv asaṃsṛṣṭo yaḥ kramād upacīyate
2.250 ekam āhur anekārthaṃ śabdam anye parīkṣakāḥ
tathā sa eva gośabdo vāhīke+api vyavasthitaḥ
2.255 gotvānuṣaṅgo vāhīke nimittāt kaiś cid iṣyate
arthamātraṃ viparyastaṃ svarūpe tu śrutiḥ sthitā
mantrāś ca viniyogena labhante bhedam ūhavat
2.259 tāny āmnāyāntarāṇy eva paṭhyate kiṃ cid eva tu
anarthakānāṃ pāṭho vā śeṣas tv anyaḥ pratīyate
anyā japaprabandheṣu sā tv ekaiva pratīyate
yuktaḥ pratyāyayaty arthaṃ taṃ gauṇam apare viduḥ
2.266 yas tv anyasya prayogeṇa yatnād iva niyujyate
nimittaṃ tatra mukhyaṃ syān nimitti gauṇa iṣyate
2.268 purārād iti bhinne+arthe yau vartete virodhini
2.270 yac cāpy ekaṃ padaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ caritāstikriyaṃ kva cit
tad vākyāntaram evāhur na tad anyena yujyate
2.271 yac ca ko+ayam iti praśne gaur aśva iti cocyate
praśna eva kriyā tatra prakrāntā darśanādikā
ādhikyam api manyante prasiddher nyūnatāṃ kva cit
saṃbandhisadṛśād dharmāt taṃ gauṇam apare viduḥ
manyante sa gavādis tu gauṇa ity ucyate kva cit
2.276 kriyāntare na caiteṣāṃ vibhavanti na śaktayaḥ
rūpād eva tu tādarthyaṃ niyamena pratīyate
taṃ mukhyam arthaṃ manyante gauṇaṃ yatnopapāditam
2.282 agnidattas tu yo+agniḥ syāt tatra svārthopasarjanaḥ
na sarvaḥ pratyayas tasmin prasiddha iva jāyate
bhedāt tu sparśanādīnāṃ na jalaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
yas tasmāl lakṣyate bhedas tam asatyaṃ pracakṣate
2.290 yac ca nimnonnataṃ citre sarūpaṃ parvatādibhiḥ
na tatra pratighātādi kāryaṃ tadvat pravartate
na tathālātacakrasya vicchinnaṃ spṛśyate hi tat
nagareṣu na te tadvad gandharvanagareṣv api
tāvān na mṛnmayeṣv asti tasmāt te viṣayaḥ kanaḥ
na te svapnādiṣu svasya tadvad arthasya sādhakāḥ
yathā prasiddhir lokasya tathā tad avasīyate
2.297 yac copaghātajaṃ jñānaṃ yac ca jñānam alaukikam
tasmāt prayojakād anyān api pratyāyayaty asau
2.301 tathā śabdo+api kasmiṃś cit pratyāyye+arthe vivakṣite
tathā śabdo+api saṃbandhī pravivektuṃ na śakyate
kva cit sāṃnidhyam apy eṣāṃ pratipattāv akāraṇam
2.305 yac cānupāttaṃ śabdena tat kasmiṃś cit pratīyate
kva cit pradhānam evārtho bhavaty anyasya lakṣaṇa
2.306 ākhyātaṃ taddhitārthasya yat kiṃ cid upadarśakam
2.308 hrasvasyārdhaṃ ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tasyāsaṃnidhāv api
2.309 dīrghaplutābhyāṃ tasya syān mātrayā vā viśeṣaṇam
jāter vā lakṣaṇāya syāt sarvathā saptaparṇavat
2.310 gantavyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sūrya iti kālasya lakṣaṇe
jñāyatāṃ kāla ity etat sopāyam abhidhīyate
sāmānyam āśrayaḥ śakter yaḥ kaś cit pratipādakaḥ
2.312 kākebhyo rakṣyatāṃ sarpir iti bālo+api coditaḥ
upaghātapare vākye na śvādibhyo na rakṣati
śabdārthāḥ pravibhajyante na rūpād eva kevalāt
2.316 sāmarthyam aucitī deśaḥ kālo vyaktiḥ svarādayaḥ
śabdā vākyasya teṣv artho na rūpād adhigamyate
stūyate sā stutis tasya kartur eva prayojikā
śāstreṇa pratiṣiddhe+arthe vidvān kaś cit pravartate
nānyathā pratipattavyaṃ na dato gamayed iti
tatrāpi ca pravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś copadiśyate
sāpekṣā ye tu vākyārthāḥ padārthair eva te samāḥ
2.326 vākyaṃ tad api manyante yat padaṃ caritakriyam
tad apy ekaṃ samāptārthaṃ vākyam ity abhidhīya
2.329 apare tu padasyaiva tam arthaṃ pratijānate
2.330 yasminn uccarite śabde yadā yo+arthaḥ pratīyate
tam āhur arthaṃ tasyaiva nānyad arthasya lakṣaṇam
2.332 tāni śabdāntarāṇy eva paryāyā iva laukikāḥ
2.333 pratibodhābhyupāyās tu ye taṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ prati
2.334 asatyāṃ pratipattau vā mithyā vā pratipādane
svair arthair nityasaṃbandhās te te śabdā vyavasthitāḥ
2.335 yathāprakaraṇaṃ dvāram ity asyāṃ karmaṇaḥ śrutau
badhāna dehi vety etad upāyād avagamyate
arthas tu tasya saṃbandhī prakalpayati saṃnidhim
nārthāc chabdasya sāṃnidhyaṃ na śabdād arthasaṃnidhiḥ
2.341 na cāpi rūpāt saṃdehe vācakatvaṃ nivartate
ardhaṃ paśor iti yathā sāmarthyāt tad dhi kalpate
saṃsarge ca vibhakto+asya tasyārtho na pṛthag yadi
2.344 vākyasya buddhau nityatvam arthayogaṃ ca laukikam
2.345 vyāptimāṃś ca laghuś caiva vyavahāraḥ padāśrayaḥ
loke śāstre ca kāryārthaṃ vibhāgenaiva kalpitaḥ
tasmād alaukiko vākyād anyaḥ kaś cin na vidyate
2.347 anyatra śrūyamāṇaiś ca liṅgair vākyaiś ca sūcitāḥ
2.348 utsargavākye yat tyaktam aśabdam iva śabdavat
tad bādhakeṣu vākyeṣu śrutam anyatra gamyate
2.349 brāhmaṇānāṃ śrutir dadhni prakrāntā māṭharād vinā
ekam eveṣyate kaiś cid bhinnarūpam iva sthitam
2.351 niyamaḥ pratiṣedhaś ca vidhiśeṣas tathā sati
dvitīye yo lug ākhyātas taccheṣam alukaṃ viduḥ
2.354 saṃjñāśabdaikadeśo yas tasya lopo na vidyate
viśiṣṭarūpā sā saṃjñā kṛtā ca na nivartate
2.355 saṃjñāntarāc ca dattāder nānyā saṃjñā pratīyate
2.357 varṇānām arthavattvaṃ tu saṃjñānāṃ saṃjñibhir bhavet
2.359 ekadeśāt tu saṃghāte keṣāṃ cij jāyate smṛtiḥ
smṛtes tu viṣayāc chabdāt saṃghātārthaḥ pratīyate
2.360 ekadeśāt smṛtir bhinne saṃghāte niyatā katham
2.361 ekadeśasarūpās tu tais tair bhedaiḥ samanvitāḥ
teṣāṃ ye sādhavas teṣu śāstre lopādi śiṣyate
na hy anvākhyāyake śāstre teṣu dattādivat smṛtiḥ
2.364 kṛtaṇatvāś ca ye śabdā nityāḥ kharaṇasādayaḥ
2.365 gotrāṇy eva tu tāny āhuḥ saṃjñāśaktisamanvayāt
2.366 vyavahārāya niyamaḥ saṃjñānāṃ saṃjñini kva cit
nitya eva tu saṃbandho ḍitthādiṣu gavādivat
saṃjñāyāṃ sā hi puruṣair yathākāmaṃ niyujyate
saṃjñāḥ kriyante sarvāsu saṃjñāsv eṣaiva kalpanā
2.370 saṃjñā svarūpam āśritya nimitte sati laukikī
kā cit pravartate kā cin nimittāsaṃnidhāv api
2.372 āvṛtter anumānaṃ vā sārūpyāt tatra gamyate
2.374 viṣayaṃ kṛtrimasyāpi laukikaḥ kva cid uccaran
vyāpnoti dūrāt saṃbuddhau tathā hi grahaṇaṃ dvayoḥ
anyathā hi vyavasthāne na tadarthaḥ prakalpate
pratyekaṃ pratipadyante na tu nāṭyakriyām iva
bhujiḥ karoti bhujyarthaṃ na tantreṇa pradīpavat
2.384 lakṣaṇārthā śrutir yeṣāṃ kāṃ cid eva kriyāṃ prati
tair vyastaiś ca samastaiś ca sa dharma upalakṣyate
2.385 vṛṣalair na praveṣṭavyam ity etasmin gṛhe yathā
pratyekaṃ vā samastair vā ṇatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate
svaṃ svaṃ bhojyaṃ vibhāgena prāptaṃ saṃbhūya bhuñjate
2.393 vākyāntarāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ samāptiḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
teṣāṃ tadānīṃ bhinnasya kiṃ padārthasya sattayā
2.396 atha tair eva janitaḥ so+artho bhinneṣu vartate
pūrvasyārthasya tena syād virodhaḥ saha vā sthitiḥ
2.399 yathā sādhāraṇe svatvaṃ tyāgasya ca phalaṃ dhane
2.402 nārthavattā pade varṇe vākye caivaṃ viśiṣyate
abhyāsāt prakramo+anyas tu viruddha iva dṛśyate
2.403 viniyogād ṛte śabdo na svārthasya prakāśakaḥ
2.407 āmnāyaśabdān abhyāse ke cid āhur anarthakān
2.410 prayogād abhisaṃdhānam anyad eṣu na vidyate
viṣaye yataśaktitvāt sa tu tatra vyavasthitaḥ
na jātv arthāntare vṛttir anyārthānāṃ kathaṃ ca na
kāmaṃ vimarśas tatrāyaṃ na vākyāvayave pade
2.415 pūrvair arthair anugato yathārthātmā paraḥ paraḥ
2.416 aṅgīkṛte tu keṣāṃ cit sādhyenārthena sādhane
sāmarthyāt saṃbhavas tasya śrutis tv anyanivṛttaye
prakāśate tadanyeṣāṃ vākyaṃ vākyārtha eva ca
2.420 svarūpaṃ vidyate yasya tasyātmā na nirūpyate
nāsti yasya svarūpaṃ tu tasyaivātmā nirūpyate
indriyāṇāṃ yathā kāryam ṛte dehān na kalpate
2.426 darśanasyāpi yat satyaṃ na tathā darśanaṃ sthitam
satyo vā viparīto vā vyavahāre na so+asty ataḥ
2.429 sad ity etat tu yad vākyaṃ tad abhūd asti neti vā
2.431 prādhānyāt tu kriyā pūrvam arthasya pravibhajyate
āśliṣṭo yo+anupaśliṣṭaḥ sa kadā cit pratīyate
na svaśaktiḥ padārthānāṃ saṃspraṣṭuṃ tena śakyate
2.440 lakṣaṇād vyavatiṣṭhante padārthā na tu vastutaḥ
upakārāt sa evārthaḥ kathaṃ cid anugamyate
2.441 vākyārtho yo+abhisaṃbandho na tasyātmā kva cit sthitaḥ
2.442 padārthe samudāye vā samāpto naiva vā kva cit
2.445 saṃpratyayārthād bāhyo+arthaḥ sann asan vā vibhajyate
anyatra ca tato rūpaṃ na tāsām upalabhyate
2.448 ekatiṅ yasya vākyaṃ tu śāstre niyatalakṣaṇam
mṛgaḥ paśyata yātīti bhedābhedau na tiṣṭhataḥ
brāhmaṇā iti nākhyāta- rūpād bhedaḥ pratīyate
2.456 sakṛc chrutā saptadaśasv anāvṛttāpi yā kriyā
2.458 uccāraṇe tu vākyānām anyad rūpaṃ na gṛhyate
pratipattau tu bhinnānām anyad rūpaṃ pratīyate
kartarīti yathā tac ca paśvādiṣu vibhajyate
2.460 yady ākāṅkṣā nivarteta tadbhūtasya sakṛc chrutau
naivānyenābhisaṃbandhaṃ tad upeyāt kathaṃ ca na
2.462 kva cit kriyā vyaktibhāgair upakāre pravartate
sāmānyabhāga evāsyāḥ kva cid arthasya sādhakaḥ
2.463 kālabhinnāś ca ye bhedā ye cāpy uṣṭrāsikādiṣu
prakrame jātibhāgasya śabdātmā tair na bhidyate
eṣāṃ kramo vibhaktānāṃ tannibaddhā sakṛc chrutiḥ
2.467 dvāv apy upāyau śabdānāṃ prayoge samavasthitau
kramo vā yaugapadyaṃ vā yau loko nātivartate
2.468 krame vibhajyate rūpaṃ yaugapadye na bhidyate
2.469 bhedasaṃsargaśaktī dve śabdād bhinne iva sthite
2.471 bhedanirvacane tv asya pratyekaṃ vā samāpyate
2.473 dviṣṭhāni yāni vākyāni teṣv apy ekatvadarśinām
2.477 anekā śaktir ekasya yugapac chrūyate kva cit
liṅgād vā tantradharmād vā vibhāgo vyavatiṣṭhate
pravibhāgas tathā sūtra ekasminn eva jāyate
2.487 nyāyaprasthānamārgāṃs tān abhyasya svaṃ ca darśanam
2.488 vartmanām atra keṣāṃ cid vastumātram udāhṛtam
kiyad vā śakyam unnetuṃ svatarkam anudhāvatā
2.490 tat tad utprekṣamāṇānāṃ purāṇair āgamair vinā
3.1.1 dvidhā kaiś cit padaṃ bhinnaṃ caturdhā pañcadhāpi vā
3.1.2 padārthānām apoddhāre jātir vā dravyam eva vā
3.1.5 saṃśleṣamātraṃ badhnātir yadi syāt tu vivakṣitaḥ
3.1.7 yathā rakte guṇe tattvaṃ kaṣāye vyapadiśyate
3.1.12 jātau padārthe jātir vā viseṣo vāpi jātivat
śabdair apekṣyate yasmād atas te jātivācinaḥ
3.1.13 dravyadharmā padārthe tu dravye sarvo+artha ucyate
3.1.19 anupravṛttirūpā yā prakhyā tām ākṛtiṃ viduḥ
ke cid vyāvṛttirūpāṃ tu dravyatvena pracakṣate
3.1.20 bhinnā iti paropādhir abhinnā iti vā punaḥ
3.1.21 naikatvaṃ nāpi nānātvaṃ na sattvaṃ na ca nāstitā
saṃsṛṣṭāḥ puruṣārthasya sādhikā na tu kevalāḥ
3.1.25 na tad utpadyate kiṃ cid yasya jātir na vidyate
kva cit kāryeṣv abhivyaktim upayānti punaḥ punaḥ
3.1.27 nirvartyamānaṃ yat karma jātis tatrāpi sādhanam
3.1.28 vidhau vā pratiṣedhe vā brāhmaṇatvādi sādhanam
3.1.32 satyāsatyau tu yau bhāgau pratibhāvaṃ vyavasthitau
satyaṃ yat tatra sā jātir asatyā vyaktayaḥ smṛtāḥ
jātir ity ucyate tasyāṃ sarve śabdā vyavasthitāḥ
3.1.34 tāṃ prātipadikārthaṃ ca dhātvarthaṃ ca pracakṣate
sā nityā sā mahān ātmā tām āhus tvatalādayaḥ
kramarūpasya saṃhāre tat sattvam iti kathyate
3.1.39 pūrvasmāt pracyutā dharmād aprāptā cottaraṃ padam
3.1.40 āśrayaḥ svātmamātrā vā bhāvā vā vyatirekiṇaḥ
abhivyaktāḥ svakāryāṇāṃ sādhakā ity api smṛtiḥ
3.1.45 citrādiṣv apy abhivyaktir jātīnāṃ kaiś cid iṣyate
prāṇyāśritās tu tāḥ prāptau nimittaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ
3.1.46 jñānaṃ tv asmadviśiṣṭānāṃ tāsu sarvendriyaṃ viduḥ
3.1.51 na vinā saṃkhyayā kaś cit sattvabhūto+artha ucyate
ataḥ sarvasya nirdeśe saṃkhyā syād avivakṣitā
3.1.52 ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā keṣāṃ cid avivakṣitam
tad dhi jātyabhidhānāya dvitvaṃ tu syād vivakṣitam
3.1.53 yady etau vyādhitau syātāṃ deyaṃ syād idam auṣadham
ity evaṃ lakṣaṇe+arthasya dvitvaṃ syād avivakṣitam
saṃkhyāyāḥ khanati dvābhyām iti rūpād dhi sāśritā
3.1.56 liṅgāt tu syād dvitīyādes tad ekatvaṃ vivakṣitam
kriyāyām aṅgabhāvaś ca tat tv etasmād vivakṣitam
3.1.58 grahās tv anyatra vihitā bhinnasaṃkhyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
3.1.59 aṅgatvena pratītānāṃ saṃmārge tv aṅgināṃ punaḥ
nirdeśaṃ prati yā saṃkhyā sā kathaṃ syād vivakṣitā
3.1.60 nānyatra vidhir astīti saṃskāro nāpi cāṅgitā
hetuḥ saṃkhyāvivakṣāyā yatnāt sā hi vivakṣitā
3.1.61 saṃmārjane viśeṣaś ca na grahe kva cid āśritaḥ
vihītās te ca saṃskāryāḥ sarveṣām āśrayas tataḥ
3.1.62 pratyāśrayaṃ samāptāyāṃ jātāv ekena cet kriyā
paśunā na prakalpeta tat syād eva prakalpanam
3.1.63 ekena ca prasiddhāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ yadi saṃbhavāt
ke cid icchanti na tv atra saṃkhyāṅgatvena gṛhyate
3.1.66 dvitīyādi tu yal liṅgam uktanyāyānuvādi tat
yuktaṃ yat sādhanatvaṃ syān na tv anyārthopalakṣaṇam
vidhivākye śrutā saṃkhyā lakṣaṇāyāṃ na bādhyate
3.1.73 kaś cid eva guṇo dravye yathā sāmarthyalakṣaṇaḥ
3.1.74 tayos tu pṛthagarthitve saṃbandho yaḥ pratīyate
na tasminn upaghāto+asti kalpyam anyan na cāśrutam
3.1.77 yadā tu jātiḥ śaktir vā kriyāṃ praty upadiśyate
3.1.78 jātīnāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca tulye+aṅgatve kriyāṃ prati
3.1.79 vyaktiśakteḥ samāsannā jātayo na tathā guṇāḥ
sākṣād dravyaṃ kriyāyogi guṇas tasmād vikalpate
atadguṇo+ataś chāgaḥ syān meṣo vā tadguṇo bhavet
saṃkhyāviśeṣam utsṛjya kva cit saiva pravartate
svārthaṃ pravartamānaṃ tu na saṃkhyām avalambate
3.1.84 yāvatāṃ saṃbhavo yasya sa kuryāt tāvatāṃ yadi
ālambhanaṃ guṇais tena pradhānaṃ syāt prayojitam

tāvat pareṣāṃ rūpeṇa sādhyaḥ sann abhidhīyate
na kriyāvācināṃ tasmāt prayogas tatra vidyate
3.8.20 asan nivartate tasmād yat sat tad upalabhyate
tayoḥ sadasatoś cāsāv ātmaika iva gṛhyate
3.8.22 ante yā vā kriyābhāge jātiḥ saiva kriyā smṛtā
3.8.24 antye vātmani yā sattā sā kriyā kaiś cid iṣyate
bhāva eva hi dhātvartha ity avicchinna āgamaḥ
3.8.25 buddhiṃ tajjātim anye tu buddhisattām athāpare
3.8.29 *pūrvabhāgas tu yaj jātāt taj janmety apadiśyate
3.8.31 phalaṃ phalāpadeśo vā vastu vā tadvirodhi yat
tad anyad eva pūrveṣāṃ nāga ity apadiśyate
3.8.32 naivāsti naiva nāstīti vastuno grahanād vinā
kaś cid vedāprakāśe+api prakāśe tata eva vā
3.8.34 vyāpi saukṣmyaṃ kva cid yāti kva cit saṃhanyate punaḥ
akurvāṇo+atha vā kiṃ cit svaśaktyaivaṃ prakāśate
bhāgair iva prakḷptiś ca tāṃ kriyām apare viduḥ
sādhyā ca sādhanaṃ caiva phalaṃ bhoktā phalasya ca
3.8.37 kriyām anye tu manyante kva cid apy anapāśritām
3.8.39 prakṛtiḥ sādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tac ca kārakam
saṃsarge kaś cid esāṃ tu prādhānyena pratīyate
sādhyatve vā tiṅantena kṛtāṃ bhedo na kaś cana
ṣaṣṭhvāḥ sā lena saṃbandhe vyudastā kartṛkarmanoḥ
na saṃbhavati siddhatve sa sādhyaḥ syāt kathaṃ punaḥ
3.8.46 etāvat sādhanaṃ sādhyam etāvad iti kalpanā
śāstra eva na vākye+asti vibhāgaḥ paramārthataḥ
prakalpitā yathā śāstre sa ghañādisv api kramaḥ
sattvabhāvas tu yas tasyāḥ sa ghañādinibandhanaḥ
3.8.50 tatra yam prati sādhyatvam asiddhā taṃ prati kriyā
siddhā tu yasmin sādhyatvaṃ na tam eva punaḥ prati
3.8.51 rājñaḥ putrasya napteti na rājñi vyatiricyate
tiṅantair antareṇevam upamānaṃ tato na taiḥ
3.8.55 sādhanatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca tiṅkṣu saṃbandhināṃ yataḥ
tenādhyāropa eva syād upamā tu na vidyate
kriyā caivāśraye sarvā tatra tatra samāpyate
ātau tasya samāptatvād upamārtho na vidyate
siddheś ca prakrame sādhyam upamātum na śakyate
arthātmā bhidyate bhāve sa bāhyābhyantare kramaḥ
3.8.60 sāmānye bhāva ity atra yal liṅgam upalabhyate
bhedānāṃ anumeyatvān na tat teṣu vivakṣyate
na ca liṅgam pacādināṃ bhavatau samavasthitam
3.8.63 ekaś ca so+arthaḥ sattākhyaḥ katham cit kaiś cid ucyate
nityam ekaṃ vibhu dravyaṃ parimāṇaṃ kriyāvatām
kriyābhedāya kālas tu saṃkhyā sarvasya bhedikā
3.9.3 utpattau ca sthitau caiva vināśe cāpi tadvatām
3.9.5 yadi na pratibadhnīyāt pratibandhaṃ ca notsṛjet
na hi bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā vastu kiṃ cana vidyate
3.9.7 naiko na cāpy aneko+asti na śuklo nāpi cāsitaḥ
dravyātmā sa tu saṃsargād evaṃrūpaḥ prakāśate
3.9.8 saṃsargināṃ tu ye bhedā viśeṣās tasya te matāḥ
sa bhinnas tair vyavasthānāṃ kālo bhedāya kalpate
3.9.11 sthitasyānugrahas tais tair dharmaiḥ saṃsargibhis tataḥ
kāla eva hi viśvātmā vyāpāra iti kathyate
sa kalāḥ kalayan sarvāḥ kālākhyāṃ labhate vibhuḥ
3.9.15 pratibhaddhāś ca yās tena citrā viśvasya vṛttayaḥ
tāḥ sa evānujānāti yathā tantuḥ śakuntikāḥ
kuto+apy adbhutayā vṛttyā śaktibhiḥ sā niyamyate
3.9.18 tatas tu samavāyākhyā śaktir bhedasya bādhikā
ekatvam iva tā vyaktīr āpādayati kāraṇaiḥ
3.9.19 athāsmān niyamād ūrdhvaṃ jātayo yāḥ prayojikāḥ
tāḥ sarvā vyaktim āyānti svacche chāyā ivāmbhasi
3.9.21 āśrayāṇāṃ ca nityatvam āśritānāṃ ca nityatā
tā vyaktīr anugṛhṇāti sthitis tena prakalpate
naiṣāṃ sattām anudgṛhya vṛttir janmavatāṃ smṛtā
sā śaktīḥ pratibadhnāti jāyante ca virodhinaḥ
3.9.25 prayojakās tu ye bhāvāḥ sthitibhāgasya hetavaḥ
tirobhavanti te sarve yata ātmā prahīyate
3.9.29 jahāti sahavṛttāś ca kriyāḥ sa samavasthitāḥ
samatvaṃ viṣamatvaṃ vā sa ekaḥ pratipadyate
3.9.33 ārambhaś ca kriyā caiva niṣṭhā cety abhidhīyate
3.9.34 yāvāṃś ca dvyaṇukādīnāṃ tāvān himavato+apy asau
na hy ātmā kasya cid bhettuṃ pracetuṃ vāpi śakyate
3.9.35 anyais tu bhāvair anyeṣāṃ pracayaḥ parikalpyate
śanair idam idaṃ kṣipram iti tena pratīyate
3.9.36 asataś ca kramo nāsti sa hi bhettuṃ na śakyate
3.9.38 bhūtaḥ pañcavidhas tatra bhaviṣyaṃś ca caturvidhaḥ
3.9.39 kāle nidhāya svaṃ rūpaṃ prajñayā yan nigṛhyate
3.9.40 bhāvināṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ tasya ca pratibimbakam
3.9.43 ayanapravibhāgaś ca gatīś ca jyotiṣāṃ dhruvā
nakṣatrākhyā pṛthak teṣu cihnamātraṃ tu tārakāḥ
bhedā iva trayaḥ siddhā yāṃl loko nātivartate
3.9.50 dvābhyāṃ sa kila śaktibhyāṃ bhāvānāṃ varaṇātmakaḥ
atītākhyā tu yā śaktis tayā janma virudhyate
3.9.53 dvau tu tatra tamorūpāv ekasyālokavat sthitiḥ
atītam api keṣāṃ cit punar viparivartate
keṣāṃ cid vartamānatvāc caiti tadvad atītatām
3.9.56 dve eva kālasya vibhoḥ keṣāṃ cic chaktivartmanī
ke cid buddhyanusaṃhāra- lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ pracakṣate
3.9.58 jñānānugataśaktiṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā satyataḥ sthitam
3.9.59 tisro bhāvasya bhāvasya keṣāṃ cid bhāvaśaktayaḥ
tābhiḥ svaśaktibhiḥ sarvaṃ sadaivāsti ca nāsti ca
kramas tās tadabhedāc ca sadasattvaṃ na bhidyate
adhvanām ekatā nāsti na ca kiṃ cin nivartate
prathamaṃ tad avidyāyāṃ yad vidyāyāṃ na vidyate
3.9.68 viśiṣṭam avadhiṃ taṃ tam upādāya prakalpate
tāvān eva kṣaṇaḥ kālo yugamanvantarāṇi vā
yad ambhasi prakṣaraṇaṃ tat kālasyaiva ceṣṭitam
3.9.71 alpe mahati vā chidre tatsaṃbandhe na bhidyate
3.9.72 ākrīḍa iva kālasya dṛśyate yaḥ svaśaktibhiḥ
3.9.73 tvacisārasya vā vṛddhiṃ tṛṇarājasya vā dadhat
ataḥ kriyāntarābhāve sā kriyā kāla iṣyate
3.9.79 bhūto ghaṭa itīyaṃ ca sattāyā eva bhūtatā
3.9.80 parato bhidyate sarvam ātmā tu na vikalpyate
sādṛśyāt sati bhede tu tadaṅgatvena gṛhyate
3.9.85 sad asad vāpi vastu syāt tṛtīyaṃ nāsti kiṃ cana
tena bhūtabhaviṣyantau muktvā madhyaṃ na vidyate
sad asad vāpi tenaikaṃ kramarūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
nirvṛttirūpaṃ nirvṛtteḥ sāmānyam atha vā bhavet
3.9.89 kāryotpattau samarthaṃ vā svena dharmeṇa tat tathā
na ca bhūtam anutpannaṃ na bhaviṣyat tathāvidham
bhāvy āsīd iti sūtreṇa tat kāle+anyatra śiṣyate
3.9.94 svakāla eva sādhutve kālabhede gatiḥ katham
na syād atyantabhūtatvam evaikaṃ tatra saṃbhavet
3.9.97 āmiśra eva prakrāntaḥ sa padārthas tathāvidhaḥ
3.9.98 śuddhe ca kāle vyākhyātam āmiśre na prasidhyati
adhyasyate viruddhe+arthe na ca tena virudhyate
3.9.101 bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ity etau pratyayau vartamānatām
tatra rūpaṃ yad adhyastaṃ tatkālaṃ tat pratīyate
3.9.109 niṣpattāv avadhiḥ kaś cit kaś cit prativivakṣitaḥ
yaḥ samāsādanād bhedaḥ sa tatra na vivakṣitaḥ
3.9.114 yogād vā strītvapuṃstvābhyāṃ na kiṃ cid avatiṣṭhate
svasminn ātmani tatrānyad bhūtaṃ bhāvi ca kathyate
3.10.2 sad asad vāpi caitanyam etābhyām avagamyate
caitanyabhāge prathamaḥ puruṣo na tu vartate
3.10.4 saṃbodhanārthaḥ sarvatra madhyame kaiś cid iṣyate
tathā saṃbodhane sarvāṃ prathamāṃ yuṣmado viduḥ
svāhendraśatrur vardhasva yathā rājā bhaveti ca
yuṣmadaḥ prathamāntasya paraś cen na padād asau
nirdeśaś cānyathā śāstre nityatvān na virudhyate
3.10.8 yathānirdeśam arthāḥ syur yesāṃ śāstraṃ vidhāyakam
kim cit sāmānyam āśritya sthite tu pratipādanam
3.10.9 yo+aśve yaḥ pīṭha ity atra bhūtayor aśvapīṭhayoḥ
3.11.2 sa dharmo vyatirikto vā teṣāṃ ātmaiva vā tathā
3.11.3 samavetā paricchedye kva cid anyatra sā sthitā
3.11.4 paratve cāparatve ca bhede tulyā śrutir yathā
3.11.6 svabuddhyā tam apoddhṛtya loko+apy āgamam āśritaḥ
3.11.8 yathaivāviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na kiṃ cid avabhāsate
tathā bhāvo+apy asaṃsṛṣṭo na kaś cid upalabhyate
3.11.9 bhedena tu samākhyātaṃ yal loko+apy anuvartate
3.11.10 buddhau sthiteṣu teṣv evam adhyāropo na durlabhaḥ
paradharmasya na hy atra sadasattvaṃ prayojakam
saṃkhyāsu saṃkhyā liṅgeṣu liṅgam evaṃ prakalpate
3.11.14 saṃsṛṣṭeṣv api nirbhāge bhūteṣv arthakriyā yathā
sattvādiṣu ca mātrāsu sarvāsv evaṃ pratīyate
vinā tena na saṃkhyānām anyāsām asti saṃbhavaḥ
ekatvābhyāṃ samutpannam evaṃ vā tat pratīyate
3.11.17 ekatvasamudāyo vā sāpekṣe vā pṛthak pṛthak
ekatve dvitvam ity evaṃ tayor dvivacanaṃ bhavet
samūhatve tu tan na syāt svāṅgādisamudāyavat
3.11.23 na saṃkhyāyāṃ na saṃkhyeye dvau daśety asti saṃbhavaḥ
bhedābhāvān na saṃkhyāyāṃ virodhān na tadāśraye
3.11.25 saṃkhyā nāma na saṃkhyāsti saṃjñaiṣeti yathocyate
rūpaṃ na rūpam apy evaṃ samjñā sā hi sitādiṣu
rūpatvajātiyogāc ca rūpe rūpam iti smṛtam
3.11.27 nimittam ekam ity atra vibhaktyā nābhidhīyate
tadvatas tu yad ekatvaṃ vibhaktis tatra vartate
3.11.28 ekasya pracayo dṛṣṭaḥ samūhaś ca dvayos tathā
3.11.29 tad ekam api caikatvaṃ vibhaktiśravaṇād ṛte
nocyate tena śabdena vibhaktyā tu sahocyate
syātām asati tasmimś ca prakṛtyartho na kalpyate
3.12.1 ya ātmanepadād bhedaḥ kva cid arthasya gamyate
anyataś cāpi lādeśān manyante tam upagraham
3.12.2 kva cit sādhanam evāsau kva cit tasya viśeṣaṇam
lādeśaiḥ sa kriyābhedo vākyeṣv api niyamyate
3.12.4 dhātvarthas tadviśeṣaś cāpy uktaḥ kva cid upagrahaḥ
3.12.6 kesāṃ cit kartrabhiprāye ṇicā saha vikalpate
3.12.7 krīṇīṣva vapate dhatte cinoti cinute+api ca
3.12.8 saṃvidhānaṃ pacādināṃ kva cid arthaḥ pratīyate
tathābhūtā kriyā yā hi tatkartā phalabhāg yataḥ
kesāṃ cid anye tu kṛtāḥ svariteto ñitas tathā
tulyārtheṣv api cāvaśyaṃ na sarveṣv ekadharmatā
bhidyate na tu liṅgākhyo bhedas tatra tadāśritaḥ
3.12.17 tasmād avasthite+apy arthe kasya cit pratibadhyate
śabdasya śaktiḥ sa tv eṣa śāstre+anvākhyāyate vidhiḥ
tat pradhānaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ na lābhādi prayojanam
3.12.19 yatrobhau svāmidāsau tu prārabhete saha kriyām
yugapad dharmabhedena dhātus tatra na vartate
ity ayaṃ śeṣaviṣayaḥ kaiś cid atrānuvarṇyate
3.12.24 atha pratividhātā yo halaiḥ kṛṣati pañcabhiḥ
3.12.26 śuddhe tu saṃvidhānārthe kaiś cid atreṣyate kṛṣiḥ
taddharmā yajir ity evaṃ na syāt tatrātmanepadam
3.13.4 tisro jātaya evaitāḥ kesāṃ cit samavasthitāḥ
3.13.5 hastinyāṃ vaḍavāyāṃ ca strīti buddheḥ samanvayaḥ
3.13.7 buddhyā kalpitarūpeṣu liṅgeṣv api ca saṃbhavaḥ
strītvādīnāṃ vyavasthā hi sā liṅgair vyapadiśyate
mukhyebhya iva liṅgebhyo bhedā loke vyavasthitāḥ
atyantādarśane na syād asattvaṃ prati niścayaḥ
siddhe hi darśane kiṃ syād anumānaprayojanam
kā cit pralīyate kā cit kathaṃ cid abhivardhate
3.13.17 pravṛtter ekarūpatvaṃ sāmyaṃ vā sthitir ucyate
3.13.18 guṇā ity eva buddher vā nimittatvaṃ sthitir matā
kasya cic chabdasaṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kva cid iṣyate
3.13.20 saṃnidhāne nimittānāṃ kiṃ cid eva pravartakam
yad yad dharme+aṅgatām eti liṅgaṃ tat tat pracakṣate
3.13.27 utpattiḥ prasavo+anyeṣāṃ nāśaḥ saṃstyānam ity api
ātmarūpaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ sthitir ity apadiśyate
3.13.28 dṛṣṭaṃ nimittaṃ kesāṃ cij jātyādivad avasthitam
nānātvaṃ janayantīva śabdā liṅge+api sa kramaḥ
nimittadarśanād arthe kaiś cit sarvatra varṇyate
kutsitasthā tu yā kutsā tadarthaḥ ko vidhīyate
3.14.4 kutsitatvena kutsyo vā na samyag vāpi kutsitaḥ
3.14.5 na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā bhedābhāvāt pratīyate
rūpābhedād viśeṣaṃ tam abhivyaṅktuṃ na śaknutaḥ
3.14.14 dravyāvasthā tṛtīyā tu yasyāṃ saṃsṛjyate dvayam
buddhyāvasthā vibhajyante sā hy arthasya vidhāyikā
bhedābhedāv upādāya kva cid ekāctvam ucyate
3.14.20 dravyātmānas trayas tasmād buddhau nānā vyavasthitāḥ
3.14.21 sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca śabdayoḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
3.14.25 evaṃ jātimati dravye pratyāsanne kriyāṃ prati
3.14.27 tile pūrvam upātte vā tatraiva matub iṣyate
sa ca dharmaḥ samāseṣu guṇas tasmād viśeṣaṇam
bhinnam atrādhikaraṇaṃ prāg vṛttes tac ca gṛhyate
pratyekaṃ jātivad vṛttis tathā dvandvapadeṣv api
te viṣṇumitrā iti ca bhinneṣu sahacāriṣu
yābhyāṃ caikam anekārthaṃ tābhyām evāparaṃ padam
3.14.35 duḥkhā durupapādā ca tasmād bhāṣye+apy udāhṛtā
vibhāgena samākhyāne tatas tad dvyartham ucyate
3.14.37 vākye+api niyatā dharmāḥ ke cid vṛttau dvayos tathā
te tv abhedena sāmarthya- mātra evopavarṇitāḥ
3.14.39 vṛttir anyapadārthe yā tasyā vākyeṣv asaṃbhavaḥ
cārthe dvandvapadānāṃ ca bhede vṛttir na vidyate
prāg vṛtter jātivācitvaṃ na ca gaurakharādiṣu
na nityagrahaṇaṃ yuktaṃ kauṭilye yaṅvidhau yathā
3.14.46 vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca sāmānye kaiś cid iṣyate
svārthavat sā vyapekṣāsya vṛttāv api na hīyate
3.14.50 abudhān praty upāyāś ca vicitrāḥ pratipattaye
3.14.52 śabdāntaratvād yuktādiḥ kva cid vākye prayujyate
nīlotpalādy api tathā bhāgābhyāṃ vartate vinā
3.14.56 saptaparṇādivad bhedo na vṛttau vidyate kva cit
3.14.57 yā sāmānyāśrayā saṃjñā viśeṣaviṣayā ca yā
bheda eva vibhāṣāyā niyato viṣayo yataḥ
3.14.60 yataś cāviṣayaḥ so+asyās tasmān nāsty akṛtārthatā
3.14.61 mahākaṣṭaśritety evaṃ na syād bhedaḥ padatraye
3.14.62 mahāraṇyam atīte tu tripadād bhidyate svaraḥ
dvipade tena yagapat tritayaṃ na samasyate
śabdāntaratvād vākye tu vṛttau nityaṃ na vidyate
3.14.67 akarmakatve saty evaṃ ktāntaṃ bhāvābhidhāyi tat
tataḥ kriyāvatā kartrā yogo bhavati karmaṇām
3.14.70 putrīyatau na putro+asti viśeṣecchā tu tādṛśī
3.14.71 prāṇair vinā yathā dhārir jīvatau prāṇakarmakaḥ
na cātra dhārir na prāṇā jīvatis tu kriyāntaram
sad apīcchākyacaḥ karma vākya eva prayujyate
3.14.75 śabdā yathā vibhajyante bhāgair iva vikalpitaiḥ
padaṃ vākye pade dhātur dhātau bhāgaś ca muṇḍivat
3.14.78 yathaiva ḍitthe davatiḥ pācake pacatis tathā
ḍayatiś ca paciś caiva dvāv apy etāv alaukikau
3.14.79 prakṛtipratyayāv ūhyau padāt tābhyāṃ padaṃ tathā
anubandhasvarādibhyaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ śāstraṃ na tān prati
3.14.86 taddhito yogabhedena vākyaṃ vā syād vibhāṣitam
3.14.87 vyatiriktasya sādhutve tad eva ca nidarśanam
punaś ca pratisaṃhāre vṛttim eke pracakṣate
vyāpāre tannimittānāṃ na grāhyaṃ syāt tathā sthitam
tasmād anupakāre vā grāhyaṃ vā na tathā sthitam
3.14.95 abudhān prati vṛttiṃ ca vartayantaḥ prakalpitām
3.14.96 anvayād gamyate so+artho virodhī vā nivartate
3.14.97 upāyamātraṃ nānātvaṃ samūhas tv eka eva saḥ
3.14.99 vācikā dyotikā vāpi saṃkhyānāṃ vā vibhaktayaḥ
avibhāgena vartante tāṃ saṃkhyāṃ tādṛśīṃ viduḥ
3.14.102 bhedānāṃ vā parityāgāt saṃkhyātmā sa tathāvidhaḥ
prakhyāyate na śuklādi- bhedarūpas tu gṛhyate
bhāgaḥ prakāśitaḥ kaś cic chāstre+aṅgatvena gṛhyate
3.14.106 avyayānāṃ ca yo dharmo yaś ca bhedavatāṃ kramaḥ
3.14.107 alukaś caikavadbhāvas tasmin sati na śiṣyate
3.14.108 jātau dvivacanābhāvāt tad vṛttiṣu na vidyate
3.14.112 prāg vṛtter yuktavadbhāve ṣaṣṭhī bhedāśrayā bhavet
3.14.113 vidyamānāsu saṃkhyāsu ke cit saṃkhyāntaraṃ viduḥ
3.14.114 vyāpāraṃ yāti bhedākhyais tat svair avayavaiḥ kva cit
ātmā bhedānapekṣo+asya kva cid eti nimittatām
3.14.115 dāsyāḥ patir iti vyakto godāv iti ca dṛśyate
3.14.116 dvyādināṃ ca dviputrādau bāhyo bhedo nivartate
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād ubhaśabde na tat tathā
3.14.118 ubhayas tatra tulyārtho vṛttau nityaṃ prayujyate
ubhe iti tataḥ svārthe bhede vṛttiḥ prayujyate
svabhāvād aparārthatvāt tatra bhedo na hīyate
pratyayaṃ tayapaṃ hitvā nāsty uttarapade punaḥ
kumāryagāre na hy asti samāso vacanāntare
3.14.123 ekadvayor yañādināṃ vibhāṣā luṅ na kalpate
yauṣmākas tāvakaś ceti bhedābhāvān na sidhyati
3.14.124 dṛṣṭo gārgyatare bhedas tathā gargatarā iti
ādeśaiḥ samjnayā vāpi vibhaktyā vyajyate vinā
3.14.127 vayasvini paricchedaḥ krīte cāpi na gamyate
taddharmatvād abhedāt tu ghaṭādibhyo na dṛśyate
3.14.129 śrūyate vacanaṃ yatra bhāvas tatra viśiṣyate
nivartate yad vacanaṃ tasya bhāvo na vidyate
vākye dṛṣṭaṃ yad atyantam abhāvas tasya vṛttiṣu
3.14.132 abhāvo vā luko yatra rūpavān vā vidhīyate
sarvatraiva viśeṣas tu nāvaśyaṃ tādṛśo bhavet
3.14.134 āteś ca bhedahetutvān na liṅgena viśeṣyate
pradhānaṃ mṛgadugdhādau gārgīputre na sa kramaḥ
3.14.135 abhede liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogāc chuklaṃ paṭā iti
3.14.137 śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ
vṛtter abhinnarūpatvāt teṣu vṛttir na vidyate
tasmāt tadāśrayaṃ liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca prasajyate
3.14.139 saliṅgaṃ ca sasaṃkhyaṃ ca tato dravyābhidhāyinā
saṃbadhyate padaṃ tatra tayor bhinnā śrutir bhavet
yasmād viśeṣas tenātra bhedakāryaṃ na kalpate
3.14.142 viśeṣa eva sāmānyaṃ viśesād bhidyate yataḥ
3.14.143 yad yad āśrīyate tat tad anyasya vinivartakam
prayogeṣv eva sādhutvaṃ vākye prakramyate tadā
sāmānyaṃ yat tad atyantaṃ tatraiva samavasthitam
3.14.148 na gotvaṃ śābaleyasya gaur iti vyapadiśyate
3.14.149 vyatireke ca saty evaṃ matupaḥ śravanaṃ bhavet
lug anvākhyāyate tasmād rasādibhyaś ca nāsti saḥ
3.14.150 yat so+ayam iti saṃbandhād rūpābhedena vartate
śuklādivat tato lopas tad rasādau na vidyate
3.14.151 āveśo liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ kva cin mañcādivat sthitah
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhe sa prasthādau na vidyate
ta āśraye+api vidyanta iti buddhir nivartyate
viśeṣaṇaṃ tato dharmāñ jātes tat pratipadyate
nyakkāriṇi syur utkṛṣṭe prakṛteḥ syād viliṅgatā
3.14.161 kālyāṃ kālād dvitīyāntāt kāle kālyās tarab bhavet
nyakkāriṇi tathā gārgye gargebhyaḥ pratyayo bhavet
3.14.162 nyakkartṛṣu ca gargeṣu gārgyāt syāt tac ca neṣyate
kumāryāḥ svārthike ṅīp syāt prakṛtyartho hi nādhikaḥ
3.14.164 upāttaṃ ca prakṛtyartho dravyam evāśrayas tayoḥ
3.14.165 rūpābhedāc ca tad dravyam ākāṅkṣāvat pratīyate
viśeṣair bhinnarūpais tad āśrayair iva yujyate
saṃkhyā ca tābhyām dravyātmā so+abhinno vyapadiśyate
stryarthas tasyecchayā yogaḥ prakṛtyā pratyayena vā
3.14.171 stryarthaḥ saṃstyānavad dravyaṃ prakṛtyarthaś ca yady asau
3.14.172 saṃstyānena kva cid dravyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yady upalakṣitam
brāhmaṇyādau yadā vṛttās tebhyaḥ syuḥ pratyayās tadā
prakṛtyarthaś ca saṃstyānaṃ svārthikāḥ pratyayās tadā
3.14.176 saṃstyāne kevale vṛttiḥ prakṛtīnām na vidyate
3.14.177 upakāri ca saṃstyānaṃ yeṣu śabdeṣv apekṣitam
tebhyaṣ ṭābādayas tac ca bhūtādiṣv avivakṣitam
yasmād bhinnair api dravyais tad ekaṃ sad viśiṣyate
3.14.180 mātrāṇām hi tirobhāve parimāṇam na vidyate
kumārya iti tena syāt kumāryāṃ bhedasaṃbhavāt
luk taddhitalukīti syāl luk tatrāpy upalakṣaṇam
3.14.184 kesāṃ cit tyaktabhedeṣu dravyeṣv eva vidhīyate
kṛte buddhyaiva bhedānām āśrayatve ca kalpite
taddharmatvaṃ tato dvandve cādiṣv arthakṛtaṃ hi tat
3.14.195 cārthaḥ śabde kva cid bhedāt kathaṃ cit samavasthitaḥ
dyotakāś cādayas tasya vaktā dvandvas tu tadvatām
dyotakatvān na kalpeta tasmāt sad upalakṣyate
śabdaḥ kaś cit tam evārthaṃ kathaṃ cit pratipadyate
3.14.198 śabdād arthāḥ pratāyante sa bhedānāṃ vidhāyakaḥ
anumānaṃ vivakṣāyāḥ śabdād anyan na vidyate
nipāto liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ dvandvas tv arthasya vācakaḥ
3.14.206 yasya nāsti kriyāyogaḥ svatantro+asau na vidyate
artho dvandvasya tatra syād upādānam anarthakam
nimittam api cāsyārthaḥ svadharmair yujyate tataḥ
3.14.208 bāhyo nāsty āśrayo dvandve viśeṣau tatra hi śrutau
ekaḥ samūho dharmān sa bhāgayoḥ pratipadyate
yau bhedāv āśritas tatsthe liṅgasaṃkhye prapadyate
3.14.212 yathā gaur iti śuklāder abhidhānaṃ na vidyate
3.14.213 saṃbandhī niyato rūḍhaś citrāṇāṃ na ca vidyate
gavāṃ yathā vajrapāṇis tryakṣe vā+api vyavasthitaḥ
3.14.214 śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ
na citragur viśeṣāṇāṃ rūpābhedāt tu vācakaḥ
3.14.216 yathā citragur ity etat prayukte na prayujyate
evaṃ yadi syāt sāmānyaṃ tasya na syāt pratiśrutiḥ
sa prātipadikārthaś ca tathābhūtaḥ kathaṃ bhatvet
3.14.225 bhedena tu vivakṣāyāṃ sāmānye vā vivakṣite
3.14.226 sādhutvaṃ na vibhaktyartha- mātre vṛttasya dṛśyate
3.14.227 so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād dravyavṛttir ayaṃ yadā
3.14.229 sādharmyam avyayena syād bahuvrīhes tathā sati
vinā vibhaktyā saṃbandho vibhaktyā vidyate vinā
vastvantaram upakṣiptam iti ke cit pracakṣate
saṃbandhair vā viśiṣṭānāṃ tadvatāṃ syān nimittatā
3.14.234 ke cit saṃyogino daṇḍād viṣāṇāt samavāyinaḥ
tadvati pratyayān āhur bahuvrīhiṃ tathaiva ca
3.14.237 svāmini vyatirekaś ca vākye yady api dṛśyate
asyaitā iti tatrārthe bahuvrīhir na vidyate
3.14.239 yadā pratyavamarśas tu tāsāṃ svāmī gavām iti
3.14.241 nānā citrā iti yathā nimittam anurudhyate
nānābhūte+api vṛttaḥ san bahuvrīhis tathā bhavet
3.14.242 saṃbandhini nimitte tu dravyadharmo na hīyate
āsanna eva dravyatvāt taddharmair na virudhyate
3.14.244 vibhaktyarthena cāviṣṭaṃ śuddhaṃ ceti dvidhā sthitam
dravyaṃ śuddhasya yo dharmaḥ sa na syād anyadharmaṇaḥ
dravyāśritatvaṃ hi tayos tato+anyasya na sidhyataḥ
nañsamase yatas tatra trayaḥ pakṣā vicāritāḥ
abrahmaṇādiṣu nañaḥ prayogo na hi vidyate
3.14.251 prāk samāsāt padārthānāṃ nivṛttir dyotyate nañā
kriyayā yasya saṃbandho vṛttis tasya na vidyate
3.14.255 ktvānte ca tumunante ca nañsamāse na dṛśyate
3.14.259 kāmacāre ca saty evam asataḥ syāt pradhānatā,
guṇatvam itareṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ vā syāt pradhānatā
jātyā bhinnāṃ tataḥ sattāṃ prasaktām apakarṣati
akṛtaś ceti saṃghātaḥ sa evābrāhmaṇe kramaḥ
atha jātimato+arthasya kaś cid dharmo nivartitaḥ
3.14.270 avaśyaṃ brāhmaṇe kaś cit kva cid dharmo na vidyate
śabdasya vṛttir yady asti nañaḥ śrutir anarthikā
3.14.277 yady apy ubhayavṛttitvaṃ pradhānaṃ tu pratīyate
prasthānaṃ gamyate śuddhe tadarthe+api na tiṣṭhatau
3.14.279 ayaṃ padārtha etasmin kṣatriyādau na vidyate
3.14.280 buddher viṣayatāṃ prāpte śabdād arthe pratīyate
pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā grutyā hy artho+anusajyate
śabdapravṛttir na tv asti loṣṭādiṣu viparyayāt
3.14.282 anekasmād asa iti prādhānye sati sidhyati
3.14.284 pradhānam atra bhedyatvād ekārtho vikṛto nañā
hitvā svadharmān vartante dvyādayo+apy ekatāṃ gatāḥ
vṛttau tasya pradhānatvāt sā saṃkhyā na nivartate
aneka iti paścāc ca tiṣṭhatīty anuṣajyate
3.14.294 sādhyatvāt tatra siddhena kriyā dravyeṇa lakṣyate
prāg evāṅgīkṛtaṃ dravyam ataḥ pūrveṇa bhidyate
vākye+api tena naikatva- mātram eva nivartyate
tailena bhojane+aprāpte na tv anyad upasecanam
asan brāhmaṇa ity ābhyāṃ tathānye kṣatriyādayaḥ
3.14.299 asāsno gaur iti yathā, gavayo vyapadiśyate
jātyantaraṃ na gor eva sasnābhāvaḥ pratīyate
tadrūpatvāt sa hemanta ity abhinnaḥ pratīyate
3.14.304 na caivaṃviṣayaḥ kaś cid bahuvrīhiḥ prakalpate
agur aśva iti vyāptir nañsamāsena yasya na
3.14.307 brāhmaṇatvena cāsattvād ucyate sat tad anyathā
asad ity api sattvena sataḥ sattā nivartyate
3.14.313 samāse śrūyate svārtho yena tadvāṃs tadāśrayaḥ
3.14.315 te kṣatriyādibhir vācyā vācyā vā sarvanāmabhiḥ
ekatvād ekaśabdatvaṃ nyāyyaṃ tasyāś ca varṇyate
3.14.319 āśrayāṇāṃ hi liṅgaiḥ sā niyatair eva yujyate
virodhitvāt prasajyeta nāśritaṃ tac ca laukikam
3.14.321 sāmānyam ākṛtir bhāvo jātir ity atra laukikam
liṅgaṃ na saṃbhavaty eva tenānyat parigṛhyate
3.14.322 pravṛttir iti sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya kathyate
āvirbhāvas tirobhāvaḥ sthitiś cety atha bhidyate
satataṃ na viyujyante vācaś caivātra saṃbhavaḥ
3.14.325 tenāsya citirūpaṃ ca citikālaś ca bhidyate
tasya svarūpabhedas tu na kaś cid api vidyate
3.14.327 avasthā tādṛśī nāsti yā liṅgena na yujyate
kva cit tu śabdasaṃskāro liṅgasyānāśraye sati
śāstre liṅgaṃ guṇāvasthā tathā cākṛtir iṣyate
3.14.329 liṅgaṃ prati na bhedo+asti dravyapakṣe+api kaś cana
yatas tad ākṛtau śāstram anyathaiva samarthyate
3.14.331 vartate yo bahuṣv artho +abhede tasya vivakṣite
3.14.332 yadā tv āśrayabhedena bheda eva pratīyate
ākṛter dravyapakṣena tadā bhedo na vidyate
3.14.333 abhede tv ekaśabdatvāc chāstrāc ca vacane sati
ekaśeṣo na vaktavyo vacanānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ
3.14.335 vyapadeśo+abhidheyena na śāstre kaś cid āśritaḥ
dravyaṃ nāma padārtho yo na ca sa pratiṣidhyate
upakāri guṇaḥ śeṣaḥ parārtha iti kalpanā
ākṛtau vā pradhānatvam ata evaṃ samarthyate
na vṛttivat parārthasya guṇabhāvas tu varṇyate
3.14.342 so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād āśrayair ākṛteḥ saha
3.14.344 pākau pākā iti yathā bhedakaḥ kaiś cid āśrayaḥ
tattvenāha tathā jāti- śabdo dravyeṣu vartate
3.14.350 asyedam iti vā yatra so+ayam ity api vā śrutiḥ
3.14.351 yat pradhānaṃ na tasyāsti svarūpam anirūpanāt
saṃsargaśrutir artheṣu sākṣād eva na vartate
3.14.353 jātau vṛtto yadā dravye sa śabdo vartate punaḥ
3.14.356 dravyasya sati saṃsparśe dravyam āśrīyate yadā
3.14.360 anirjātasya nirjñānaṃ yena tan mānam ucyate
śyāmatvam ekaṃ guṇayor ubhayor api vartate
3.14.366 yenaiva hetunā śyāmā śastrī tatra pratīyate
sa hetur devadattāyāḥ pratyaye na viśiṣyate
3.14.367 āśrayād yo guṇe bhedo jāter yā cāviśiṣṭatā
3.14.370 aśabdavācyo yo bhedaḥ śyāmamātre na vartate
śyāmeṣu keṣu cid vṛttir yasya so+atra vyapekṣyate
3.14.371 śyāmeṣu keṣu cit kiṃ cit kiṃ cit sarvatra vartate
sāmānyaṃ kaś cid ekasmiñ chyāme bhedo vyavasthitaḥ
3.14.372 tathā hi sati saurabhye bhedo jātyutpalādiṣu
gandhānāṃ sati bhede tu sādṛśyam upalabhyate
3.14.373 guṇānām āśrayād bhedaḥ svato vāpy anugamyate
anirdeśyād viśeṣād vā saṃkarād vā guṇāntaraiḥ
upameyatvam ādhikye sāmye vā na nivartate
3.14.375 anyais tu mānaṃ jātyādi bhedyasyārthasya varṇyate
3.14.376 mitas tu svena mānena prasiddho yo guṇāśrayaḥ
bhinnena yasya bhedyānām upamānaṃ tad ucyate
3.14.379 śastrīkumāryoḥ sadṛśaḥ śyāma ity evam āśrite
3.14.382 śastryāṃ prasiddhaṃ śyāmatvaṃ mānaṃ sā tena mīyate
anyā śyāmā tu tadrūpā tenātyantaṃ na mīyate
3.14.386 sādhāraṇaṃ bruvan dharma kva cid eva vyavasthitam
3.14.389 mānaṃ prati samīpaṃ vā sādṛśyena pratīyate
3.14.392 bhede+api tulyarūpatvāc chālīmṃ tān iti dṛśyate
3.14.393 kathaṃ hy avayavo+anyasya syād anya iti cocyate
atyantabhede nānātvaṃ yatra tattvaṃ na vidyate
saṅghinor na tv abhedo+asti tathānyatvam udāhṛtam
yo hi gaur iti vijñāne hetuḥ so+asti gavāntare
na kaś cid upakāro+asti buddher buddhyantaraṃ prati
3.14.397 kiṃ cid yatrāsti sāmānyaṃ yadi bhedāś ca ke cana
gotvaṃ goṣv asti sāmānyaṃ bhedāś ca śabalādayaḥ
3.14.398 sāmānyaṃ śyāmatānyaiva tad dhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayoḥ
tad eva siddhyasiddhibhyāṃ bheda ity apadiśyate
3.14.399 śyāmatvam eva sāmānyam anyeṣām ubhayoḥ sthitam
saṃpūrnatvāt tad anyasmād viśeṣa iti gamyate
3.14.400 ākṛtau vāpi sāmānye kva cid eva vyavasthitāḥ
3.14.401 jāter abhede bhede vā sādṛśyaṃ tat pracakṣate
kaś cit kadā cit arthātmā tathābhūto+apadiśyate
3.14.402 yatrārthe pratyayābhedo na kadā cid vikalpate
sa sādṛśyasya viṣaya ity anyair apadiśyate
3.14.409 śyāmatvam upamāne ced vṛttaṃ vṛttau prayujyate
3.14.410 ṭābanta eva caitrādau śyāmāśabdas tathā bhavet
3.14.412 satiśiṣṭabalīyastvād bāhye ṅiṣi ca saty api
upamānasvaro na syāt tasmāt stryantaḥ samasyate
pradhānasya tathā na syād vyāghrādau liṅgadarśanam
mṛgīva capalety atra puṃvadbhāvo na sidhyati
yathaiva mṛgadugdhādau na cet stryartho vivakṣyate
3.14.422 śyāmā śastrī yathā śyāmā śastrīkalpeti cocyate
3.14.423 atha śyāmeva śastrīyaṃ śyāmety evaṃ prayujyate
śastrī yatheyam śyāmeti tāvad eva pratīyate
pṛthag dvayoḥ śruto+apy eṣa neṣṭasvārthasya vācakaḥ
3.14.425 upameyaṃ tu yad vācyaṃ tasya cet pratipādane
3.14.427 sādṛśyamātraṃ sāmānyaṃ dviṣṭhaṃ kaiś cit pratīyate
guṇo bhede+apy abhedena dvivṛttir vā vivakṣitaḥ
rūpāt sāmānyavācitvaṃ prāg vā vṛtter udāhṛtam
3.14.432 pūjopādhiś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ kutsanopādhayaś ca ye
3.14.433 asaṃbhave+api vā vṛtteḥ syād etal liṅgadarśanam
acver iti yathā liṅgam abhāve+api bhṛśādiṣu
3.14.435 kriyety upādhiḥ prāthamyāt prakṛtyarthasya yady api
3.14.436 sattvavṛttasya śeṣe vā tṛtīyā sādhane+api vā
tiṅām asattvavācitvād ubhayaṃ tan na vidyate
3.14.440 na kevalau dravyaguṇau tadvān vāpy upamīyate
3.14.442 hotavyasadṛśo hotety atrāpy artho na vidyate
kriyāvad api kāryāṇāṃ darśanāt pratyayo bhavet
gamanaṃ kārakasyeti ṇvuly anyasmin na saṃbhavet
śuddhāyāḥ saṃbhavān na syāt kriyāyā brāhmaṇādiṣu
kriyāyā na śrutād yasmād upamānaṃ samāpyate
3.14.450 tṛtīyo+apy āśrito bhedo dharmaḥ sādhāraṇo dvayoḥ
vyāpāravān na kṛtsnasya sāmyaṃ kṛtsnena vidyate
3.14.451 dravye vāpi kriyāyāṃ vā nimittāt tat prakalpate
kriyāṇāṃ vidyamānatvād vṛttir na syād gavādiṣu
3.14.452 abhāvāt kevalāyās tu tadvān arthaḥ pratīyate
3.14.455 yo ya uccāryate śabdaḥ sa svarūpanibandhanaḥ
3.14.457 antarbhūte tu karaṇe prayogo na punar bhavet
3.14.458 śāstrābhyāsāc ca bhedo+ayam ayuktam iti varṇyate
3.14.459 vivibhaktiḥ prakṛtyarthaṃ praty upādhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet
3.14.461 sārūpyāt tu tad evedam iti tatropacaryate
śabdāntaraṃ vibhaktyā tu yuktaṃ śāstre tad aśrutam
3.14.462 prakṛtiś cet tṛtīyāntā tenety asmāt pratīyate
kriyeti prathamāntā sā kathaṃ bhavitum arhati
3.14.463 kriyayeti tṛtīyā ca prayoge kasya kalpyatām
tenety asya hi saṃbandhaḥ sūtrasthena na vidyate
tena yat tat tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyā cet seti gamyate
3.14.465 upādheḥ kasya cid vākye prayoga upalabhyate
3.14.466 nīlam utpalam ity atra na viśeṣye na bhedake
kaś cit taddharmavacano vākye śabdaḥ prayujyate
3.14.467 atyantānugamāt tatra na sūtre na ca vigrahe
3.14.468 tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyety etad vigrahe na prayujyate
yathā daṇḍaḥ praharaṇaṃ krīḍāyām iti dṛśyate
3.14.469 ghavidhau yac ca saṃjñāyām iti sūtra udāhṛtam
3.14.473 sarvair viśiṣṭās tair arthair janyante sahacāribhiḥ
buddhayaḥ pratipattṝṇāṃ śabdārthāṃs tān ato viduḥ
3.14.475 kevalānāṃ tu bhāvānāṃ na rūpam avadhāryate
vartate+avayave nāpi nopāttaṃ tyajate kva cit
3.14.478 samūhe ca pradeśe ca pañcālā iti dṛśyate
tathā viśeṣaṇaṃ sarva ity etad upapadyate
ardhaṃ ca pippalī ceti khande śabdaḥ pratīyate
tatrānyasya nivṛttyarthe śabde bhedo na gamyate
3.14.482 yad upavyañjanaṃ jāteḥ sahacāri ca karmasu
3.14.483 samudāyaḥ pradeśo vety evaṃ tasminn anāśrite
3.14.484 yaś ca tulyaśrutir dṛṣṭaḥ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ
3.14.489 nivṛttyarthā śrutir yeṣāṃ bhedas teṣv anapekṣitaḥ
vaktavyaṃ kena dharmeṇa tulyatvaṃ kriyayor iti
caitrāt ṣaṣṭhī prasajyeta yoge śattryādibhir yathā
pāṭhaḥ kadā cit kartavyas tulyau pakṣāv ubhau yataḥ
3.14.496 jahāti jātiṃ dravyaṃ vā tasmān nāvayave sthitaḥ
kriyāyās tu śrutir yasmāt tadvaty arthe+avatiṣṭhate
apekṣaṇīyā śuddhe+arthe tasmād vṛttir na kasya cit
3.14.499 sarvaṃ vāpy ekadeśo vā yasminn āśriyate kva cit
viśeṣavṛttiṃ taṃ sarvam āhur bhede vyavasthitam
3.14.500 samuccayo vikalpo vā prakārāḥ sarva eva vā
3.14.501 na hi brāhmaṇa ity atra bhedaḥ kaś cid apāśritaḥ
3.14.502 kriyā tv āśrīyate yasmin sa bhedo +adhyavasīyate
tathānyathā sarvathā cety aprayoge na vidyate
adhyetā brāhmaṇa iva pratyayo na nivartate
3.14.506 adhīte tulya ity evaṃ puṃlliṅgena viśeṣaṇam
putreṇa tulyaḥ kapila iti vṛttiḥ prasajyate
3.14.508 yāḥ putre rūḍhasaṃbandhāḥ kriyā loke vivakṣitāḥ
tābhiḥ kriyāvataḥ putrād guṇatulye vatir bhavet
3.14.509 antarbhūtaṃ nimittaṃ ca rūḍhiśabdeṣu yady api
kriyās tu sahacāriṇyo rūḍhāḥ santi padārthavat
animittaṃ vates tulyaṃ yātīty atreṣyate vatiḥ
3.14.513 dvayaṃ viśeṣyate tena yad ekatra viśeṣaṇaṃ
tulyaśabdo hi taṃ dharmam ubhayastham apekṣate
3.14.515 sūtre śrutaś ca dviṣṭho+asāv abhedena pratīyate
na ca sāmānyaśabdatvād aśrutā gamyate kriyā
ye dharmā niyatās teṣāṃ putrādiṣu na vidyate
3.14.521 yadā kriyānimittaṃ tu sādṛśyaṃ syāt kriyāvatoḥ
3.14.522 avyayeṣu vateḥ pāṭhaḥ kāryas tatra svarādivat
brāhmaṇena samo+adhyetety atra ca pratyayo bhavet
tulyam ity anyathā kalpyo vākyaśeṣo+aśruto bhavet
adhyetrā sadṛśo+adhyetety atra nāsti vater vidhiḥ
3.14.525 tulyārthair iti yā tasyās tṛtīyāyā na bhidyate
3.14.526 bhojyate brāhmaṇa iva tulyaṃ bhuktaṃ dvijātinā
paśyati brāhmaṇam iva tulyaṃ vipreṇa paśyati
3.14.528 brāhmaṇād iva vaiśyāt tvam adhīṣvādhyayanaṃ bahu
ity evamādibhir bhedas tṛtīyāyā na kaś cana
3.14.529 tulyaṃ madhurayādhīye mātrā tulyaṃ smarāmi tām
madhurāyāś ca mātuś ca kathaṃ sādṛśyakalpanā
3.14.533 ivārthe yac ca vacanaṃ pūrvasūtre ca yo vidhiḥ
kriyāśabdaśrutau bhedo na kaś cid vidyate tayoḥ
3.14.534 yady apy upādhir anyatra niyato na prayujyate
rūpābhedāt tv anirjñātā kriyātra śrūyate punaḥ
3.14.536 evaṃ ca sati pūrveṇa siddho+atrāpi vater vidhiḥ
niyame vābhidhāne vā bhidyate na kriyāśrutiḥ
ity atra dravyaguṇayoḥ pūrveṇa na vatir bhavet
3.14.541 na kā cid ivayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino
ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate tatra pūrveṇa pratyayo bhavet
ṣaṣṭhītṛtīye tatra stas tulyaśabdo hi vācakaḥ
3.14.545 gavayena samo+anadvān iti vṛttis tathā bhavet
na tv asti gaur ivety atra vyatireka ivāśrayaḥ
prakṛtāṃ tām atas tyaktvā vibhaktyantaraṃ āśritam
3.14.548 saptamy api na tatrāsti jñāpakārthā tu sā kṛtā
saptamy evocyate sarvā na santy anyā vibhaktayaḥ
bādhitā vinivarteta ṣaṣṭhī sā gṛhyate punaḥ
arhārthe+api vatiḥ siddhaḥ sa tv ekena nidarśyate
3.14.553 tena tulyam iti prāpte kriyopādhiḥ prasidhyati
rājavad vartate rājety atra bhede vivakṣite
3.14.556 rājavad rūpam asyeti rājany eva vivakṣite
3.14.558 kṛtahastavad ity etat prasiddheṣv eva dṛśyate
rājatvena prasiddhe ca rājñi rājavad ity api
3.14.560 arhateś ca kriyā kartrī yā tasyāṃ vatir iṣyate
rājānam arhati cchattram iti na tv evamādiṣu
chattrādyarthe tu vacane pratyākhyānaṃ na saṃbhavet
prayogaḥ so+api caitasya viṣaye vidyate vateḥ
tenāsmin viṣaye bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā na vidyate
janyanta iva śabdānām arthāḥ sarve vivakṣayā
na tatra kaś cit sādṛśyaṃ sad api pratipadyate
3.14.573 atyantaṃ viṣaye bhinne yāvat prakhyā na bhidyate
na tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ kasya cid vinivartate
3.14.574 ayam eva tu sūtreṇa bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ
3.14.576 ke cit pumāṃso bhāṣante strīvat puṃvac ca yoṣitaḥ
3.14.577 sadṛśas tvaṃ tavaiveti loke yad abhidhīyate
3.14.578 yuktam aupayikaṃ rājña ity arthasya nidarśane
3.14.581 svaṃ rūpam iti caitasminn arthasyāpi parigrahaḥ
dhātunā kṛtam ity evam asmin sūtre pratīyate
3.14.583 yaḥ śabdaś caritārthatvād atyantaṃ na prayujyate
3.14.584 kriyāyāṃ sādhane dravye prādayo ye vyavasthitāḥ
3.14.585 pratyayena vinā prādis tatrārthe na prayujyate
teṣām udvata ity atra vaktavyā savibhaktitā
3.14.588 vatyarthaṃ nāvagāhete puṃvad ity asya darśanāt
3.14.589 etam utkrāmato nūnaṃ vatyarthaṃ nañsnañāv iti
3.14.590 nañsnañau vihitau yena sa yogo nāvagāhate
vatiprakaraṇaṃ tad dhi liṅgam evaṃ samarthyate
paśū rudra iva hy etāv ity ekavacanaśrutiḥ
3.14.593 upamānasya bhedāc ca bahuṣu syād año vidhiḥ
kāśyapā iti lopaḥ syāt tathā pratikṛtiṣv api
lum manuṣye tathoktaṃ syāl liṅgasyaikasya siddhaye
3.14.595 upameyeṣu bhinneṣu kiṃ cid ekaṃ pravartate
pratyayasya vidhau tatra nityaṃ yuktavad iṣyate
3.14.596 yadā pratyupameyaṃ tu tad ekaikam avasthitam
3.14.598 pracaye bhidyamāne tu saṃkhyā pūleṣu bhidyate
arthabhedo lubanteṣu naivaṃ kaś cana dṛśyate
3.14.601 yaḥ saṃbandhigato bhedaḥ sa prayoge pratīyate
saṃbandhinām ato bheda upameye na gamyate
3.14.603 upamānaṃ samastānām abhinnam śrūyate kva cit
3.14.604 yathā garuḍa ity etad vyūhāpekṣaṃ prayujyate
3.14.606 meghāḥ śaila ivety ukte samastānāṃ pratīyate
kākatālīyam ity atra prasiddham hy upalakṣaṇam
3.14.608 rājāśvādiś ca viṣayaḥ syād anyo vety aniścitam
tena cchasya vidhānāt prāg vyapadeśo na vidyate
dasyor abhinipātas tu tālasya patanaṃ yathā
3.14.613 yad anvākhyāyakaṃ vākyaṃ tad evaṃ parikalpyate
prayogavākvaṃ yal loke tad evaṃ na prayujyate
3.14.615 kākasya tālena yathā vadho yasya tu dasyunā
bṛhatka iti tatraiṣa maṇau śabdaḥ prayujyate
3.14.619 sādṛśyam eva sarvatra prakāraḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
bhede+api tu prakārākhyā kaiś cid abhyupagamyate
prakāramātre vartitvā kaś cit tadvati vartate
sa cāyam avyayībhāve bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ
3.14.623 sādṛśyaṃ yogyatā kaiś cid anāv abhyupagamyate
yat tu mūrtigataṃ sāmyaṃ tat sahenābhidhīyate
3.14.625 gaur vāhīka iti dvitve sādṛśyaṃ pratyudāhṛtam
śuklādau sati niṣpanne vāhīko na dvir ucyate
